subject: Questions about Pedal Sets
description_text:
Hello from Germany, 

I'm interested in ordering a two pedal Set from you. Despite extensive research, I have no idea what the exact differences are in your pedals.

 It's totally confusing... Can you please help me? 

What are the exact differences? You definitely need to work on your website. I can't figure it out. Maybe other Customer also have Big Problems :)

Best regards, Andre
